document_data.name: Softshield
document_data.mainbody: '''Softshield''' was an ointment that helped prevent contracting a disease.{{Cite dragon/300/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Old Angrath's Smokehouse|85}}<ref group="note">The source does not indicate that the infection has to come from a wound, so it may be possible that this concoction was effective on airborne diseases such as [[featherlung]].
document_data.Description: Softshield was thick paste with a strong odor made by the [[sorceress]] and [[alchemist]] [[Angrath Dree]] from [[herb]]s and saps found in [[northwest Faerûn]]. It could be purchased from her at [[Old Angrath's Smokehouse]] in [[Red Larch]], or possibly from secondary vendors elsewhere. The usual price for a jar of ointment was 10 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers: If applied to the skin within ten minutes, softshield slightly improved the chance of resisting disease. After ten minutes, there was no benefit.
